Lyric:
[by:Crashray]
[ti:Back Together]
[ar:Robin Thicke/Nicki Minaj]
[al:Back Together]
[00:03.330]Hey Robin 
[00:06.650]Didn't I rock with you all night? 
[00:09.480]Wasn't it good enough? Don't lie 
[00:11.410]Didn't you tell me that I blew your mind? 
[00:15.500]Brought out the animal in me 
[00:17.450]Nobody else can tame that beast 
[00:19.500]Why did you have to go and say goodbye? 
[00:24.300]Now all I wanna do is get, get you back (get, get) 
[00:31.900]Cause girl, you're still the best that I've ever had 
[00:38.230]A one, two, three, let's go 
[00:40.630]You used your love to tear me apart 
[00:43.890]Now put me back together (now put me back together) 
[00:48.400]You put a bullet into my heart 
[00:52.320]Now put me back together 
[00:56.580]Come on, I'm an addict 
[00:58.400]Come on, gotta have 
[01:00.260]Come on, let me at it tonight 
[01:04.640]You used your love to tear me apart 
[01:09.100]Now put me back together 
[01:12.010]I wanna live between your legs 
[01:14.470]Hear all the freaky things you said 
[01:16.500]I don't like what you're turning me into, into 
[01:20.050]Baby, you left me on the floor 
[01:22.900]Now I keep driving past your door 
[01:24.560]I don't know why you gotta be so cruel (I don't know why) 
[01:28.850]Now all I wanna do is get, get you back 
[01:33.590](Wanna get you back, yeah, yeah, baby, get you back) 
[01:37.020]Cause girl you're still the best that I've ever had 
[01:43.280]A one, two, three, let's go

[01:53.400]You put a bullet into my heart (straight into my heart) 
[01:57.230]Now put me back together 
[02:01.310]Come on, I'm an addict 
[02:03.380]Come on, gotta have

[02:13.510]Now put me back together (together, baby) 
[02:16.600]Yo, ayo, Robin 
[02:18.400]I get more head than when they noddin' 
[02:20.020]Kitty on fleek, it's popping, I'm Mary Poppins 
[02:22.080]Just for the record, that hard is what I'm copping 
[02:24.070]Blasting 2Pac in some fishnet stockings 
[02:26.080]You know you miss this, right? 
[02:28.030]M-I-S-S, miss this spot 
[02:30.110]Used to call me Hillary cause I ride'em (Rodham) 
[02:33.920]I said, "ring, ring, ring, ring, ra-ring, ring 
[02:36.230]Put a ring on it or ding, da-ding, ding" 
[02:38.140]Boy your times up, where'd you wind up? 
[02:40.230]There's levels to this, you shoulda climbed up 
[02:41.800](Let's go) 
[02:50.090]You used your love to tear me apart 
[02:54.460]Now put me back together (now put me back together) 
[02:58.430]You put a bullet into my heart (right into my heart)
